DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Other Mental Health Disease or Disorder Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field for information related to a person's medical history of other mental health disorders.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Other Mental Health Disease or Disorder
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a person's medical history of other mental health disorders.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredName: Other Mental Health Disease or Disorder
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The overall state of an individual's psychologic constitution.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The overall state of an individual's psychologic constitution.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
